Package jason.util

Class asl2dot

java.lang.Object
jason.util.asl2xml
jason.util.asl2dot
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class asl2dot
extends asl2xml
Convert an agent asl code to dot (http://www.graphviz.org/) -- used to produce the graph of goals.
Author:
Jomi
